LanguageData.VG_Campfire.label: bamboo campfire
LanguageData.VG_Campfire.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.VG_TorchLamp.label: bamboo torch lamp
LanguageData.VG_TorchLamp.description: A bamboo torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.Cuptea.label: Garden Tea
LanguageData.Cuptea.description: A drink made from brew tea leaves.
LanguageData.VG_BarleyTea.label: Barley Tea
LanguageData.VG_BarleyTea.description: A drink made from brewed barley. \n\nDrink Effects: Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.Coffee.label: Garden Coffee
LanguageData.Fruitdrink.label: Fruit drink
LanguageData.Fruitdrink.description: A drink made from pressing fruit for their juice. \n\nDrink Effects: Consciousness and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.Chocomilk.label: chocolate milk
LanguageData.bowlstew.label: bowl of stew
LanguageData.bowlstew.description: A bowl of slow cooking stew. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness, Metabolism, Blood Filtration, and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.stirfry.label: stirfry
LanguageData.stirfry.description: Cooking technique in which ingredients are fried in a small amount of very hot oil. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.VG_Hardtack.label: Hardtack
LanguageData.VG_Hardtack.description: A simple type of biscuit. Tastes bland, but not offensive. Made from grains. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration. Great for travelling.
LanguageData.CPD_CoffeeBeans.label: coffee beans
LanguageData.CPD_CoffeeBeans.description: Raw Coffee. Best prepared as a beverage
LanguageData.Rawtea.label: tea leaves
LanguageData.Silage.label: silage
LanguageData.Silage.description: Nutrient-rich fermented hay and grains for your animals. The fermentation process preserves the silage preventing rot.
LanguageData.VG_Biofuel.label: biofuel
LanguageData.VG_Biofuel.description: Fuel made from the processes of refining various types of plants for oils and alcohols. And is used to fuel generators and workbenches.
LanguageData.Bamboo.label: bamboo
LanguageData.Bamboo.description: fast growing grass used for construction.
LanguageData.Bamboo.tools.0.label: log
LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.label: Ironwood
LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.description: Ironwood is stronger and more beautiful then normal wood. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Very beautiful decorative material.
LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.tools.0.label: log
LanguageData.RawAgave.label: agave fruit
LanguageData.RawBerries.label: berries
LanguageData.RawBerries.description: Assorted berries. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.Rawapple.label: apples
LanguageData.Rawapple.description: A red fruit grow on trees.
LanguageData.Rawbanana.label: banana
LanguageData.Rawbanana.description: A yellow fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawgrape.label: grapes
LanguageData.Rawgrape.description: A sweet fruit that grows on vines.
LanguageData.Raworange.label: orange
LanguageData.Raworange.description: A sweet fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawpeach.label: peach
LanguageData.Rawpeach.description: A sweet fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawpineapple.label: pineapple
LanguageData.Rawpineapple.description: A tropical fruit having large swordlike leaves and a large, fleshy, edible, multiple fruit with a terminal tuft of leaves.
LanguageData.Rawblueberry.label: blueberry
LanguageData.Rawblueberry.description: Blue colored berry that grows in bushes. Even good raw.
LanguageData.Rawwatermelon.label: watermelon
LanguageData.Rawwatermelon.description: A large, roundish or elongated fruit of a trailing vine having a hard, green rind and a sweet, juicy, usually pink or red pulp.
LanguageData.Rawdate.label: date
LanguageData.Rawdate.description: A sweet fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawfig.label: fig
LanguageData.Rawfig.description: A sweet fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawgooseberry.label: gooseberry
LanguageData.Rawgooseberry.description: A sweet fruit that grows on vines.
LanguageData.Rawcloudberry.label: cloudberry
LanguageData.Rawcloudberry.description: A sweet fruit that grows on vines.
LanguageData.RawCherry.label: Cherries
LanguageData.RawCherry.description: A red berry fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.RawCoconut.label: Coconut
LanguageData.RawCoconut.description: A coconut fruit that grows on trees. Has a hard outer shell with a juicy fruit flesh inside.
LanguageData.Honey.label: honey
LanguageData.Honey.description: Super sweet, super delicious, honey is used as a natural sweetener in all sorts of goodies. Also used in the production of mead. Doesn't spoil, though can deteriorate if left outside.
LanguageData.Mead.label: honey mead
LanguageData.Mead.description: Mead can taste good, but its main effect is intoxication. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol blackouts and, over time, addiction.
LanguageData.Mead.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.Mead.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.ST_WildHoneyTree.label: bee hive
LanguageData.ST_WildHoneyTree.description: A hive of bees. Harvest them for honey.
LanguageData.RawRedLentil.label: red lentil
LanguageData.RawRedLentil.description: Raw protein-rich lentil. Used in place of meat in recipes.
LanguageData.Rawsnowbeet.label: snow beet
LanguageData.RawBarley.label: barley
LanguageData.RawBarley.description: Cereal grain used for livestock feed, cooked for food, and used for beer making.
LanguageData.Rawbean.label: bean
LanguageData.Rawbean.description: Common bean cooked up in many ways.
LanguageData.RawOlive.label: Olive
LanguageData.RawOlive.description: A small berry fruit that grows on trees.
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.label: mushroom
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.description: Raw protein-rich mushrooms. Nice to eat, even when raw.
LanguageData.RawCactusFruit.label: cactus fruit
LanguageData.VG_FoodShelf.label: food shelf 2x2
LanguageData.VG_FoodShelf.description:
A 2x2 shelf for storing perishable items. Items stored in this will not affect room beauty and they won't deteriorate, even if outside. 

This storage area is set to Important and has by default all the items that spoil from vanilla and the garden mods. 

Things to store here: Foods, Drugs, Medicines, Plant Matters, and Animals Corpses.
LanguageData.Plant_Barley.label: barley plant
LanguageData.Plant_Barley.description: A cereal grain. Hearty plant that is imune to blight. Used in cooking and for making ale.
LanguageData.Plant_Snowbeet.label: snow beet plant
LanguageData.Plant_Snowbeet.description: A simple, highly nutritious plants. Grows well even in somewhat poor soil. Harvests quickly. A strong, versatile crop. Does not die in cold weather.
LanguageData.Plant_redlentil.label: red lentil plant
LanguageData.Plant_redlentil.description: A redish variety of the lentil plant. One of the oldest know domesticated plants.
LanguageData.Plant_bean.label: bean plant
LanguageData.Plant_bean.description: Common bean cooked up in many ways.
LanguageData.Plant_Olivetree.label: olive tree
LanguageData.Plant_Olivetree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows olives and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.Plant_Tea.label: tea plant
LanguageData.Plant_Tea.description: A green leafy plant, who's leaves can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.Plant_Coffee.label: coffee plant
LanguageData.Plant_Coffee.description: A green, leafy plant yielding coffee beans. These beans can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBamboo.label: bamboo plant
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBamboo.description: A fast-growing tree-like species that grows in cluster. Bamboo can be harvested for a wood-like material. The plant itself is not beautiful.
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.label: cocoa bush
LanguageData.Plantcocoa.description: A tropical bush that produces chocolate, genetically engineered to sweeten its own product, and survive in slightly less-warm climates. Produces a lot less then the trees.
LanguageData.VG_PlantAmbrosia.label: ambrosia bush
LanguageData.VG_PlantAmbrosia.description: A bush which yields the ambrosia fruit. Ambrosia is pleasurable to eat and produces a slightly addictive chemical warmth effect. Grown in a Hydroponics basin. Does not destroy when harvested.
LanguageData.VGP_Agarilux.label: baby agarilux
LanguageData.VGP_Agarilux.description: An purple mushroom. Its size and glowing protrusions make this fungus beautiful to look at. Dies when exposed to light. Faster grow than the kind that grow in nature, but also has a much smaller yield
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.label: apple tree
LanguageData.PlantAppletree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows apples and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.label: banana tree
LanguageData.PlantBananaTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows banana and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.label: orange tree
LanguageData.PlantorangeTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows oranges and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.label: peach tree
LanguageData.PlantPeachTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows peaches and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.DateTree.label: date palm tree
LanguageData.DateTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows dates and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.FigTree.label: fig tree
LanguageData.FigTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows figs and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.Coconuttree.label: coconut tree
LanguageData.Coconuttree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows coconuts and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.PlantCherrytree.label: cherry tree
LanguageData.PlantCherrytree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows cherries and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.Plantpineapple.label: pineapple plant
LanguageData.Plantpineapple.description: Think skin fruit that grows a top a bush.
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.label: cloudberry plant
LanguageData.Plantcloudberry.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates.
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.label: gooseberry plant
LanguageData.Plantgooseberry.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates.
LanguageData.Plantgrape.label: grape vine
LanguageData.Plantgrape.description: A sweet small fruit that grows in small viney bushes.
LanguageData.Plantblueberry.label: blueberry plant
LanguageData.Plantblueberry.description: Blue colored berry that grows in bushes.
LanguageData.Plantwatermelon.label: watermelon plant
LanguageData.Plantwatermelon.description: This fruit is rich in vitamins A and C and can be eaten raw or cooked in a variety of ways.
LanguageData.VG_Plant_Agave.label: agave
LanguageData.VG_Plant_Agave.description: A large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks.
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBee.label: bee tree
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBee.description: A genetically engineered bitch tree, designed to attract bee's to build a hive in.
LanguageData.Plant_VG_Grass.label: grass
LanguageData.Plant_VG_Grass.description: Wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.WildAppletree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows apples and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.WildAppletree.label: apple tree
LanguageData.WildBananaTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows banana and is not destroyed when picked.

LanguageData.WildorangeTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows oranges and is not destroyed when picked.

LanguageData.WildDateTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows dates and is not destroyed when picked.

LanguageData.WildFigTree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows figs and is not destroyed when picked.

LanguageData.WildCoconuttree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows coconuts and is not destroyed when picked.

LanguageData.WildPlantCherrytree.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows cherries and is not destroyed when picked.
LanguageData.WildPlantCherrytree.label: cherry tree
LanguageData.WildPlantpineapple.label: pineapple plant
LanguageData.WildPlantpineapple.description: Think skin fruit that grows a top a bush.
LanguageData.WildPlantcloudberry.label: cloudberry plant
LanguageData.WildPlantcloudberry.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates.
LanguageData.WildPlantgooseberry.label: gooseberry plant
LanguageData.WildPlantgooseberry.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates.
LanguageData.Plantmushroom.label: Mushroom
LanguageData.Plantmushroom.description: This robust mushroom has been genetically engineered and cultivated to produce a filling meat substitute. Found in the wild and grown in hydroponics.
LanguageData.PlantPlumeria.label: Plumeria
LanguageData.PlantPlumeria.description: A beautiful cultivated small bushy flower that grows in random colors.
LanguageData.Wild_PlantPlumeria.label: Plumeria
LanguageData.Wild_PlantPlumeria.description: A beautiful cultivated small bushy flower that grows in random colors.
LanguageData.Plant_VGChokevine.label: chokevine
LanguageData.Plant_VGChokevine.description: Tangled masses of cord-like, spiky vines which coil in great masses along the ground. Chokevine greatky slows down anyone who moves over it. Multiple tribes have independently generated stories of chokevine strangling children to death in the night, as a way to scare kids into coming home before dark.
LanguageData.Plant_VGTallGrass.label: tall grass
LanguageData.Plant_VGTallGrass.description: Wild tall grass. Slows down anyone moving over it.
LanguageData.PlantTreeIronwood.label: ironwood tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeIronwood.description: Ironwood trees got their name from the legendary strength of the wood.
